meta.description: Optimize the number of long and short desks to maximize seating availability within budget and space constraints.

sets.name: DESK_TYPES
sets.description: Types of desks available for purchase.

params.name: cost
params.description: Cost of each type of desk.

params.name: space
params.description: Space taken by each type of desk in square feet.

params.name: seating
params.description: Number of employees each type of desk can seat.

params.name: budget
params.description: Total budget available for purchasing desks.

params.name: max_space
params.description: Maximum space available for desks in square feet.

vars.name: num_desks
vars.description: Number of desks to purchase of each type.

objective.name: max_seating
objective.expr: sum(seating[d] * num_desks[d] for d in DESK_TYPES)

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(cost[d] * num_desks[d] for d in DESK_TYPES)
constraints.description: Total cost of desks must not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: space_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(space[d] * num_desks[d] for d in DESK_TYPES)
constraints.description: Total space occupied by desks must not exceed available space.
